QuestsSorted.NameClass:
Logging.Write("[FNV_Quester]: Going to clean up the whole Horde outpost, enable Use Spirit Healer...");
wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.UseSpiritHealer = true;

Logging.Write("[FNV_Quester]: Disable Use Spirit Healer");
wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.UseSpiritHealer = false;

QuestClass.Macro: for bag = 0,4,1 do for slot = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(bag), 1 do local name = GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot); if name and string.find(name,"Divining Scroll") then local st = GetContainerItemCooldown(bag, slot); if st == 0 then UseContainerItem(bag,slot); break; end; end; end; end
